__e: Look alright, all I'm saying is that this is of no importance.
But if there is one thing I've learned on this journey... what we want doesn't matter.
Now, please, please, picture that then tell me that money is beside the point.
Why are you quizzing me on things that don't matter?
If these letters aren't important, – why do you keep reading them?
Have you ever been in love so that not even food matters, not even words?
This is not important to you, but I don't care.
- I'm sure it's nothing, but we found a bunch of these.
You claim that what I saw mattered not, but how can I be certain?
Look, I don't care how much they paid you for your tip... but if you do what I tell you, you'll earn much more.
It isn't important what I feel about you, do you understand?
But the important thing that you must remember no matter how badly you think you stink you must never, ever bust into my dressing room and use my shower.
